list.title: module:cli
list.description:
cli

Export module's command-line args-parser and input utilities.

list.title: module:cli/input
list.description:
input

Prompts user input using several of methods.

list.title: module:cli/input/ask
list.description:
input.ask

Prompts the user for input using the enquirer library.

list.title: module:cli/input/confirm
list.description:
input.confirm

Prompts the user with a confirmation question using Enquirer.

list.title: module:cli/input/select
list.description:
input.select

Prompts the user with a select menu using Enquirer and logs the selected response.

list.title: module:cli/input/suggest
list.description:
input.suggest

Prompts the user for input using Enquirer with the provided option configuration.
